import React from 'react' import styles from './Testicard.module.css' import { FaLinkedin, FiInstagram, FiLinkedin, FiTwitter, TiSocialInstagram, TiSocialLinkedin, TiSocialTwitter } from "react-icons/ti"; const Testicard = (props) => { return (
{props.name}
{props.role}
{props.desc}
) } export default Testicard
